turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, I'm looking for some movie recommendations. I'm in the mood for a good action movie. Any suggestions?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! Based on your preference for action movies, I can suggest a few. Have you seen 'Mad Max: Fury Road' or 'John Wick'? They're both highly acclaimed in the action genre. If you'd like something a bit older, 'Die Hard' is a classic.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I've seen all of those. I'm looking for something a bit more... unique. Something that isn't just pure action, maybe something with a unique blend of genres. I am getting really frustrated with the same old stuff!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I understand. Finding a movie with a unique blend of genres within the action category can be a bit tricky. Let me see... How about 'Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon'? It combines action with martial arts and a touch of romance and fantasy. Or, if you're open to some sci-fi elements, 'Edge of Tomorrow' might be a good fit. I hope these suggestions are what you're looking for!
